title: Mr. Tom
author: Mr. Tom
content: A bunch of Kafirs were killed and score more injured in Philippines. They were allegedly punished by the Islamic state organization that aims to create a worldwide Islamic khilafah. Such incidents are on a rise in south east Asia as the religious difference rises. People should embrace it if they can't avoid it.https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/islamic-state-claims-responsibility-deadly-philippine-bombing-2023-12-03/?taid=656cb42b46b6e8000137fdd6

comments.author: Hispo
comments.body: Is the Islamic State even a thing nowadays yet? The last thing I knew about them, it was they were crushed in the middle east by the United States and its allies. I know they have got some operating cells somewhere in the northern Nigeria though, I would have not expected them to reappear and carry out such disgusting act of violence. Also, I thought there were USA military bases in the Philippines, there are not? Maybe it would be a good time for the government of the Philippines to ask for help of the United States to neutralize the leftover terrorist cells in the Pacific...

comments.author: Ucy
comments.created_time: December 04, 2023, 09:19:07 AMLast edit: December 04, 2023, 12:52:04 PM by Ucy
comments.body: Sorry for the loss. Saw that yesterday or so and I took some time to research about Philippines and discovered they are mostly Catholics. And I wondered why the attacker would dare to attack in a mostly Christian country. I think it could be persecution or they were attacked for doing wrong.Anyways, True Religion or the Word of the CREATOR of the Universe needs to be diligently followed by Christains to be shielded from such attack. It's hard to successfully attack people who are properly following a good law or good constitution. Such attacks happen via loopholes which are created when the law isn't diligently followed. But there are certain attacks on True Christians that are possible especially when they are in the domain of the enemy spreading the Goodnews. It's like soldiers getting attacked on foreign lands while trying to turn the inhabitants away from evil culture. This occasionally happens to Christain spreading the Word of the CREATOR in the World and we call it persecution. Â Better to be attacked for doing right than for doing wrong.

I have Muslim friends and all of them do not support the activities of these terrorists, who commit these barbaric crimes in the name of Islam. The fight against terrorism is a global concern, so every nation needs to show concern and offer assistance to nations that these wicked humans are terrorising. I believe that the sponsors of these terrorisms have hidden agendas, they're just using religion to cover up their real intentions. Let the whole world rise up to these responsibility to crush these terror enemies.

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: Lots of people seem to be misunderstanding what true religion is. James 1:27 in the Bible says: "Religion that God our Father accepts as pure and faultless is this: to look after orphans and widows in their distress and to keep oneself from being polluted by the world."Killing people in the name of religion might be the religion of some evil people, but it isn't a religion that God respects. In fact, he condemns such religions.
